```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(DescTools)
library(caret)
library(stats)
```

```{r}
price_df = read.csv("prices.csv")
head(price_df)
```

```{r}
analysis_df = price_df[,c("index","Close_fut","Close_gas","Close_btc","Close_bond")]
```

# Diagnostic plots
```{r}
cor(analysis_df)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=analysis_df,aes(x=Close_gas,y=Close_fut)) +
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(data=analysis_df,aes(x=Close_btc,y=Close_fut)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=analysis_df,aes(x=Close_bond,y=Close_fut)) +
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
acf(analysis_df,max.mfrow=1)
```
